Title: Tina and the Real Ghost
Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim, Bernard Derriman
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Steven Davis, Kelvin Yu, Mike Benner (staff writer)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Tina begins an out-of-this-world romance with a ghost that is believed to be living in the Belcher's basement.
